attributes.action: scrap Fees for all university Students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that education should be free for everyone who chooses to go into it. i feel we pay more taxes than ever before yet we have to pay for everything and now it is forcing the poor to do to not so good universitys as they come out with so much dept or they just cant afford to go. were going to make more of a class devied if people cant afford to go to uni.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
